9906-d-08-12-99-DMIR.Narrative: THE 2330 PDSD ARRIVED AT MISSABLE JCT. WITH 58 SIDE DUMP EMPTIES, COUPLED WITH  48 LIMESTONE LOADS ON BNSF'S HILL MAIN, AND SHOVED THEM DOWN TOWARDS RICES POINT YARD TO CLEAR FOR A MOVEMENT AROUND SIDE DUMP TRAIN TO GET INTO HOLE TRACK. THE CREW KICKED SIDE DUMPS UP TRACK #1, ENGINES RAN INTO TRACK#2 TO GET AROUND SIDE DUMP EARS THAT WERE THEN DROPPED DOWN TRACK#1 SOUTHWARD. CONDUCTOR WAS ON THEPOINT TO HANDLE THE AIR ONCE CARS CLEARED ON  NORTH END FOR ENGINES TO COME OUT OF TRACK #2.  CONDUCTOR LOST FOOTIING IN STRIRUP WHEN GOING FOR ANGLE COOK, UPRIGHTED HIMSELF, PULLED THE AIR, AND JUMPED FROM CARS.  SIDE DUMPS MADE A HARD JOINT ON THE 48 LOADS, CAUSING FORCES THROUGOUT TRAIN THAT TURNED RAIL OVER AND DERAILED 15 SIDE DUMPS.NoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNone

WITH THE TRAIN MAKEUP, THE 5 LOCOMOTIVES AND HEAD PORTION OF TRAIN BEGAN BRAKING. ABLOCK OF BALLAST CARS IN REAR OF TRAIN REACTED AS ONE LONG CAR WEIGHING APPROXIMATELY 1700 TONS. THE REAR END, CONTAINING THE BLOCK OF BALLAST CARS, RAN IN ON THE TRAIN CAUSING A 1 MPH INCREASE IN LOCOMOTIVE SPEED. THIS FORCE ALSO CAUSED THREE LOCATIONS IN THE TRAIN TO DERAIL. HEAD END OF CONSIST STOPPED APPROXIMATELY 750 FT BEYOND SIGNAL. BROKEN TRACK BONDS AT RAIL JOINT CAUSED SIGNAL TO GO REDIN FACE OF TRAIN.NoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNone
